sourcesContent:
<template>
  <nav>
    <router-link :to="{name: 'Home', props: {mqttClient: mqttClient}}">Home</router-link> |
    <router-link :to="{name: 'AllData'}">All Data</router-link> |
    <router-link :to="{name: 'Recordings'}">Recordings</router-link>
  </nav>
  <router-view/>
</template>

<script>
import {ref} from "vue";
import getMqttClient from "@/composables/getMqttClient";

export default {
  setup() {
    let mqttClient = null;

    getMqttClient()
        .then((client) => {
          client.on('connect', ()=> {
            mqttClient = client.value;
            console.log(mqttClient)
          })
        })
        .catch((err) => {
          console.log(err)
        });

    return {mqttClient};
  },
}
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
}

nav {
  padding: 30px;
}

nav a {
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #2c3e50;
}

nav a.router-link-exact-active {
  color: #42b983;
}
</style>
